评论概述: Adorable! Well Made - Great Detail! Love the Suspenders!
评论详情: Current price $29.59. Gray - Size 12-18 months. Goes without saying, this outfit is simply adorable!!!! My littlest is only 5 months old but he is already wearing a 6 to 9 month size. So, of course, I ordered up so it should be perfect for Xmas, but if not, then Easter! ;) Every part of this outfit is well made and the detail is so cute! The shirt is easy to get on and open up (bottom snaps) when necessary. The pants do need to come over for a change, but again, elastic waist so also pretty easy! The outfit is easy to wear and couldn't look cuter! Even the hat is precious - there is also elastic at the back so it has a bit of give for larger heads!

This is such a cute baby outfit. Material is soft, not scratchy or funny smell. I order one size up and fits perfect. Thin but good quality. This outfit is for fall/cool weather not cold or winter. Very good made and so much detail. Price is in the higher side but its worth it, great for photoshoots

Omg, this little “newsboy” outfit couldn’t be cuter—I can picture any of the grandsons in the recent past, wearing this! The little shirt onesie has plastic snaps that hold secure, and the detachable bow tie has them, too. The little suspenders hook onto the buttons on the waist of the pants. The fabric comes a little wrinkly, but a steamer will easily get that out, for the perfect photograph, for instance. :) The onesie is comfortable on the skin, not scratchy. I recommend this little outfit; it would be the hit of a baby shower, for sure! :)
